149957 old <s>katara/</s> ¦ <lex>mfn.</lex> (<s>as</s>, <s>A</s>, <s>at</s>). (comparative of <hom>2.</hom> <s>ka</s>; declined as a <ab>pronom.</ab>, <ls>Gram. 236</ls>), who or which of two? whether of two? Analogously to <s>katama</s> above <s>katara</s> may occasionally be used to express ‘who or which of many?’ (<ab>e.g.</ab> <s>katarasyAM diSi</s>, in which quarter?), and may optionally be compounded with the word to which it refers (<ab>e.g.</ab> <s>kataraH kaWaH</s> or <s>katara-kaWaH</s>)<info lexcat="LEXID=pron,STEM=katara"/>
